Articles.Content:
Hello all! I decided, after watching the wonderful Kerbals at War video, to make a few war things of my own, and to show off my other stuff as well...

So, first up, the WOE "Starhammer" Anti-Orbital/Air Cannon.

It comes in a 2-barrel and a 4-barrel format, and its ultra-fast MuMech Industries Rotatron turret-drive mechanism ensures it can track even the fastest targets. A word of caution - deploy the outriggers before attempting to fire. The massive rail batteries have a tendency to flip the vehicle when in rapid fire mode otherwise. Single shots, however, are perfectly fine.

Also, we have the AP-1R "Kraken" Artillery platform...

It has one singularly massive railgun, capable of engaging at over 55 kilometers with accuracy. (I learned this after firing the following in the general direction of one of my ground-based comm stations.)

And a better picture with cool lights and whatnot...

More to come!

Edited August 8, 2012 by Warshawski
